verses.name: Psalms 105:28
verses.text: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.

verses.name: Psalms 105:29
verses.text: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.

verses.name: Psalms 105:30
verses.text: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.

verses.name: Psalms 105:31
verses.text: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.

verses.name: Psalms 105:32
verses.text: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.

verses.name: Psalms 105:33
verses.text: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.

verses.name: Psalms 105:34
verses.text: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,
